articles.title: Covid Vaccine During Pregnancy? Even Doctors Struggle With This Question - The New York Times
articles.description: A doctor struggles with the lack of data surrounding the Covid-19 vaccine and pregnancy.
articles.content:
So its up to me and my nurse midwife, both of us smart clinicians, but not vaccine experts. I asked her what she thought, and she told me, Honestly, I have no idea.

articles.title: Texas hospital workers turned down the vaccine -- so a senator and a cop got it instead - Raw Story
articles.description: So many workers at a hospital in Texas' Rio Grande Valley declined the new COVID-19 vaccine that the facility offered doses to other medical workers in the region. Many showed up, but so did a state lawmaker, a police officer and a sheriff's deputy who weren'…
